thread.title: Photo: Sridevi & Her Daughter Jhanvi Kapoor Are Shining Brighter Than Diamonds!
thread.title_full: Photo: Sridevi & Her Daughter Jhanvi Kapoor Are Shining Brighter Than Diamonds!

author: Divya Rao
title: Photo: Sridevi & Her Daughter Jhanvi Kapoor Are Shining Brighter Than Diamonds!
text:
Divya Rao Feb . 15 . 2017 
Sridevi is one proud mom – she has two absolutely gorgeous young daughters who are quite the fashionistas themselves. They’ve already got a massive fan following on social media and their posts give us major Kendall+Kylie Jenner feels! She shared this picture of them from a Valentines Day party and gosh, they look gorgeous! ❤️❤️❤️ A post shared by Sridevi Kapoor (@sridevi.kapoor) on Feb 14, 2017 at 7:13am PST 
Pssst, the latest Bollywood gossip has been that Jhanvi is dating this handsome young boy . You can find all the pictures here . 13
